title: High-throughput DNA synthesis for data storage
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00469D, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Meng Yu, Xiaohui Tang, Zhenhua Li, Weidong Wang, Shaopeng Wang, Min Li, Qiuliyang Yu, Sijia Xie, Xiaolei Zuo, Chang Chen
Using DNA molecules for digital data storage: the writing and reading of the data are realized by high throughput DNA synthesis and sequencing technologies, where high density array-based chips play an important role.
